page.title: 15Clubs and Hobbies
page.content: {** Clubs **}Most people belong to a {recreational}club. The clubs were in Stansted, Bishop's Stortford or Saffron Walden. They attended the clubs mostly for{stimulating {conversation}or to{keep fit.}Some people said they would like to go to more clubs but could not for personal reasons. About half said they would like more clubs in Stansted especially {squash and badminton.}The rest said they were happy with the provision. {** Hobbies **}Many people enjoyed their hobby at home. Here are the most popular hobbies:- Listening to music, cooking, reading, photography, sewing and knitting. Lots of people enjoyed collecting things.these included:- first covers of books, stamps, shells, thimbles, silvers spoons, antique bric-a-brac.
